item.title: Highlight: Swift2D
item.description: The swift language continues to impress me as it grows. GitHub is full of projects direct from Apple and others that add many features that speed up development on new and old projects alike. (Swift Argument Parser, Swift Algorithms, AsyncHTTPClient just to name a few.)
item.dc:creator: Gowtham

item.title: SwiftUI ScrollViewReader
item.description: I recently undertook a rewrite of most of the user interface in my app Pocket Bot. This presented me with the opportunity to start the adoption of SwiftUI. There were a few stumbling blocks and lessons learned, but overall went rather smoothly. That is until I started looking into updating my tvOS version.
item.dc:creator: Gowtham
